p: Although there were studies exploring the relationship between SNCA-rs11931074 and PD clinical phenotypes, the samples were not large enough to reach a convincible result and the clinical features included in the research studies were not comprehensive. By far, studies had demonstrated that SNCA-rs11931074 was associated with age at onset, hyposmia, and REM sleep behavior disorder (RBD) in PD [ 13â€“ 15]. In our study, we made a comprehensive analysis on the relationship between SNCA-rs11931074 and clinical features including motor and nonmotor symptoms and comorbidities in PD.
